humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'Lymph nodes: Sentinel lymph node Lymph node status: Negative 0/4.' This indicates that there are no positive lymph nodes and all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma, which corresponds to N0 based on New Rules 10 and 11.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'Lymph nodes: Sentinel lymph node. Lymph node status: Negative 0/4.' This indicates that there is no metastasis in the sentinel lymph node, which corresponds to a pathologic N stage of N0.
